String.Source: Bloody horkers! I told Corpulus I like that stool the best. Has the best view of all the maids that stroll through here.
String.Dest: Bloody horkers! I told Corpulus I like that stool the best. Has the best view of all the maids that stroll through here.

String.Source: I'd arm wrestle you for it, but something tells me that would leave me sore, tired, and possibly bedridden.
String.Dest: 为此，我得跟你扳扳腕子。但某些东西告诉我这会让我疼痛万分，疲倦不堪，甚至有可能卧床不起。

String.Source: What good would that stool do me then! Ha-ha-ha!
String.Dest: What good would that stool do me then! Ha-ha-ha!

String.Source: The Duke of Beards? What's it about?
String.Dest: The Duke of Beards? What's it about?

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! It was a book about a legendary barber, and bloody awful. Which is saying something for a work of non-fiction.
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! It was a book about a legendary barber, and bloody awful. Which is saying something for a work of non-fiction.

String.Source: The Duke of Beards? What's it about?
String.Dest: The Duke of Beards? What's it about?

String.Source: In fact, I once set out to burn every copy in Skyrim, but the thing took on a life of its own.
String.Dest: 事实上，我曾经打算把天际省的每一份副本都烧掉，但那东西似乎拥有了自己的生命。

String.Source: The Duke of Beards? What's it about?
String.Dest: The Duke of Beards? What's it about?

String.Source: Turns out, that piece of rubbish was the best thing that ever happened to me.
String.Dest: 结果，那坨垃圾是在我身上发生过最大的好事了。

String.Source: Why do you say that?
String.Dest: 为什么你会这么说？

String.Source: Why do you say that?
String.Dest: Why do you say that?

String.Source: The fame I received from that book gave me the coin and the authority to write what I love.
String.Dest: 我从那本书那里得到的名声让我有机会去写我喜欢的东西。

String.Source: Why do you say that?
String.Dest: 为什么你会这么说？

String.Source: Why do you say that?
String.Dest: Why do you say that?

String.Source: They say one man's trash is another man's treasure. But for me, they were one and the same.
String.Dest: They say one man's trash is another man's treasure. But for me, they were one and the same.

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: I...don't think that's a good idea. I'd rather not have the name associated with an actual living person.
String.Dest: I...don't think that's a good idea. I'd rather not have the name associated with an actual living person.

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Still, it might help market the book better. And ultimately, we're trying to sell copies, not be authentic.
String.Dest: Still, it might help market the book better. And ultimately, we're trying to sell copies, not be authentic.

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Alright, we'll go with your name. Pass that and my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'll be happy to publish the work.
String.Dest: Alright, we'll go with your name. Pass that and my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'll be happy to publish the work.

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Well, that would defeat the purpose of it, wouldn't it? You being female and all.
String.Dest: Well, that would defeat the purpose of it, wouldn't it? You being female and all.

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Still, it might help market the book better. And ultimately, we're trying to sell copies, not be authentic.
String.Dest: Still, it might help market the book better. And ultimately, we're trying to sell copies, not be authentic.

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Alright, we'll go with your name. Pass that and my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'll be happy to publish the work.
String.Dest: 好吧，我会以你的名义去的。把这个和我的忠告带给你的朋友，如果最终的版本符合要求，那我会很乐意出版我的作品。

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! That would be an odd choice indeed, considering you're not even an Orc.
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! That would be an odd choice indeed, considering you're not even an Orc.

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Still, it might help market the book better. And ultimately, we're trying to sell copies, not be authentic.
String.Dest: 而且，这可以帮助我们把书卖得更好。最重要的是，我们想要卖的的是原稿，而不是真品。

String.Source: Name the character after me. <Alias=Player>.
String.Dest: 以我的名义。 <Alias=Player>.

String.Source: Alright, we'll go with your name. Pass that and my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'll be happy to publish the work.
String.Dest: 好吧，我会以你的名义去的。把这个和我的忠告带给你的朋友，如果最终的版本符合要求，那我会很乐意出版我的作品。

String.Source: What about Gromash?
String.Dest: 格罗摩西怎么了？

String.Source: Ah, now there's a strong Orc name. I like it.
String.Dest: 啊，现在是一个强大的兽人的名字。我喜欢。

String.Source: What about Gromash?
String.Dest: 格罗摩西怎么了？

String.Source: If all goes well, the name Gromash the Stone Hand will go down in history as one of literature's most tragic figures.
String.Dest: 如果一切进展顺利的话，格里摩西 石之手这个名字将会作为文学史上最杯具的人物而青史留名。

String.Source: What about Gromash?
String.Dest: 格罗摩西怎么了？

String.Source: All that's left now is to give my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.
String.Dest: All that's left now is to give my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.

String.Source: What about Ghorbash?
String.Dest: 葛尔伯许怎么样？

String.Source: Ah, now there's a strong Orc name. I like it.
String.Dest: 啊，现在是一个强大的兽人的名字。我喜欢。

String.Source: What about Ghorbash?
String.Dest: 葛尔伯许怎么样？

String.Source: All that's left now is to give my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.
String.Dest: All that's left now is to give my suggestions to your friend. If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.

String.Source: I don't think Jaspar will like that one bit.
String.Dest: 我看贾斯帕肯定对它完全没兴趣。

String.Source: Undoubtedly, he won't. Still, if he's as desperate as he sounds, he may be willing to compromise, provided you aren't too harsh with him.
String.Dest: Undoubtedly, he won't. Still, if he's as desperate as he sounds, he may be willing to compromise, provided you aren't too harsh with him.

String.Source: I don't think Jaspar will like that one bit.
String.Dest: 我看贾斯帕肯定对它完全没兴趣。

String.Source: For instance, you can tell him he needs to make his book more accessible. That's a nice way of saying the prose is a bit over the top.
String.Dest: For instance, you can tell him he needs to make his book more accessible. That's a nice way of saying the prose is a bit over the top.

String.Source: I don't think Jaspar will like that one bit.
String.Dest: 我看贾斯帕肯定对它完全没兴趣。

String.Source: Also, the main character's name. You aside, I can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.
String.Dest: Also, the main character's name. You aside, I can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.

String.Source: I don't think Jaspar will like that one bit.
String.Dest: 我看贾斯帕肯定对它完全没兴趣。

String.Source: Undoubtedly, he won't. Still, if he's as desperate as he sounds, he may be willing to compromise, provided you aren't too harsh with him.
String.Dest: Undoubtedly, he won't. Still, if he's as desperate as he sounds, he may be willing to compromise, provided you aren't too harsh with him.

String.Source: I don't think Jaspar will like that one bit.
String.Dest: 我看贾斯帕肯定对它完全没兴趣。

String.Source: For instance, you can tell him he needs to make his book more accessible. That's a nice way of saying the prose is a bit over the top.
String.Dest: For instance, you can tell him he needs to make his book more accessible. That's a nice way of saying the prose is a bit over the top.

String.Source: I don't think Jaspar will like that one bit.
String.Dest: 我看贾斯帕肯定对它完全没兴趣。

String.Source: Also, the main character's name. You can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.
String.Dest: Also, the main character's name. You can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.

String.Source: Bogakh is fine. I think you've butchered Jaspar's work enough already.
String.Dest: 波噶克就很好。 我想你已经把贾斯帕事业毁得差不多了。

String.Source: Right. "Jaspar's" work. Well, I suppose if you don't mind, other Orcs won't either. Bogakh it is.
String.Dest: Right. "Jaspar's" work. Well, I suppose if you don't mind, other Orcs won't either. Bogakh it is.

String.Source: Bogakh is fine. I think you've butchered Jaspar's work enough already.
String.Dest: 波噶克就很好。 我想你已经把贾斯帕事业毁得差不多了。

String.Source: Take my suggestions to your "friend." If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.
String.Dest: Take my suggestions to your "friend." If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.

String.Source: Bogakh is fine. I think you've butchered Jaspar's work enough already.
String.Dest: 波噶克就很好。 我想你已经把贾斯帕事业毁得差不多了。

String.Source: Right. "Jaspar's" work. Well, I suppose if you don't mind, Orcs won't either. Bogakh it is.
String.Dest: Right. "Jaspar's" work. Well, I suppose if you don't mind, Orcs won't either. Bogakh it is.

String.Source: Bogakh is fine. I think you've butchered Jaspar's work enough already.
String.Dest: 波噶克就很好。 我想你已经把贾斯帕事业毁得差不多了。

String.Source: All that's left now is to give my suggestions to your "friend." If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.
String.Dest: All that's left now is to give my suggestions to your "friend." If the final copy passes muster, I'd be more than happy to have it published.

String.Source: What sort of changes are we talking about here?
String.Dest: 我们在这儿要谈论什么类型的变化？

String.Source: Well, for starters, we need to dumb it down a bit. A few cosmetic changes here and there ought to do it.
String.Dest: Well, for starters, we need to dumb it down a bit. A few cosmetic changes here and there ought to do it.

String.Source: What sort of changes are we talking about here?
String.Dest: 我们在这儿要谈论什么类型的变化？

String.Source: We also need to make these paragraphs cleaner. They lack direction. It's something that can be fixed easily enough.
String.Dest: We also need to make these paragraphs cleaner. They lack direction. It's something that can be fixed easily enough.

String.Source: What sort of changes are we talking about here?
String.Dest: 我们在这儿要谈论什么类型的变化？

String.Source: Lastly, the main character's name. You aside, I can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.
String.Dest: Lastly, the main character's name. You aside, I can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.

String.Source: What sort of changes are we talking about here?
String.Dest: 我们在这儿要谈论什么类型的变化？

String.Source: Well, for starters, we need to dumb it down a bit. A few cosmetic changes here and there ought to do it.
String.Dest: Well, for starters, we need to dumb it down a bit. A few cosmetic changes here and there ought to do it.

String.Source: What sort of changes are we talking about here?
String.Dest: 我们在这儿要谈论什么类型的变化？

String.Source: We also need to make these paragraphs cleaner. They lack direction. It's something that can be fixed easily enough.
String.Dest: We also need to make these paragraphs cleaner. They lack direction. It's something that can be fixed easily enough.

String.Source: What sort of changes are we talking about here?
String.Dest: 我们在这儿要谈论什么类型的变化？

String.Source: Lastly, the main character's name. I can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.
String.Dest: Lastly, the main character's name. I can tell our friend hasn't spent much time around Orcs. I think Bogakh is a female name.

String.Source: It was written by some blacksmith.
String.Dest: 这是某个铁匠写的。

String.Source: A blacksmith? Ha-ha-ha! He must be by far the most eloquent blacksmith in all of Tamriel!
String.Dest: A blacksmith? Ha-ha-ha! He must be by far the most eloquent blacksmith in all of Tamriel!

String.Source: It was written by some blacksmith.
String.Dest: 这是某个铁匠写的。

String.Source: In fact, I'd say he needs to be a bit more like his fellow tradesman in terms of word choice. This writer is a little too in love with his own voice.
String.Dest: 实际上，我想说他应该在措辞上学学他那个商人朋友。这个作家有点对自己的话太自恋了。

String.Source: Does that mean it has no chance to be published?
String.Dest: 这是代表完全没机会公开的意思吗？

String.Source: Ah, I didn't say that. Although your friend may not like what I'm about to say.
String.Dest: Ah, I didn't say that. Although your friend may not like what I'm about to say.

String.Source: Does that mean it has no chance to be published?
String.Dest: 这是代表完全没机会公开的意思吗？

String.Source: With a little polish, we can turn this into a seller. It may not give him the acclaim he seeks, but it will put food on the table.
String.Dest: With a little polish, we can turn this into a seller. It may not give him the acclaim he seeks, but it will put food on the table.

String.Source: Does that mean it has no chance to be published?
String.Dest: 这是代表完全没机会公开的意思吗？

String.Source: The problem with young artists is that they're a bit too attached to their integrity. He may not go for it.
String.Dest: The problem with young artists is that they're a bit too attached to their integrity. He may not go for it.

String.Source: Does that mean it has no chance to be published?
String.Dest: 这是代表完全没机会公开的意思吗？

String.Source: On the other hand, better to be a mediocre artist than a starving one. And it'll give him the leverage to write something of substance.
String.Dest: On the other hand, better to be a mediocre artist than a starving one. And it'll give him the leverage to write something of substance.

String.Source: It was written by a milk-drinker named Jaspar Gaerston.
String.Dest: 那时由一个叫贾斯帕·盖尔斯顿的乳臭未干的小孩写的。

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! That's not too kind of you, considering poor Jaspar's not here to defend himself.
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! That's not too kind of you, considering poor Jaspar's not here to defend himself.

String.Source: It was written by a milk-drinker named Jaspar Gaerston.
String.Dest: 那时由一个叫贾斯帕·盖尔斯顿的乳臭未干的小孩写的。

String.Source: Ah, but being a milk-drinker's nothing to be ashamed of. Most of us writers are. We tell the tales we ourselves failed to live.
String.Dest: Ah, but being a milk-drinker's nothing to be ashamed of. Most of us writers are. We tell the tales we ourselves failed to live.

String.Source: It was written by a milk-drinker named Jaspar Gaerston.
String.Dest: 那时由一个叫贾斯帕·盖尔斯顿的乳臭未干的小孩写的。

String.Source: And I'd say Jaspar can tell a tale or two. He just needs to brush up on the telling.
String.Dest: 我得说贾斯帕还是能讲一两个故事的。只是他还得在脑子里过一遍。

String.Source: This will sound like a lie, but it was actually written by a friend.
String.Dest: 这听起来像一个谎言，但它确实出自一个朋友之手。

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! Of course, I can't tell you how many writers hand me manuscripts on behalf of their "friends" in hopes of getting an honest critique.
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! Of course, I can't tell you how many writers hand me manuscripts on behalf of their "friends" in hopes of getting an honest critique.

String.Source: This will sound like a lie, but it was actually written by a friend.
String.Dest: 这听起来像一个谎言，但它确实出自一个朋友之手。

String.Source: But regardless of his identity, one thing that's certain is that your friend lacks conviction. I can see it plain as day on the page.
String.Dest: But regardless of his identity, one thing that's certain is that your friend lacks conviction. I can see it plain as day on the page.

String.Source: Have I read any of your works?
String.Dest: 我读过你的作品吗？

String.Source: You might have. I've written countless epics, poems, and tales of heroism.
String.Dest: You might have. I've written countless epics, poems, and tales of heroism.

String.Source: Have I read any of your works?
String.Dest: 我读过你的作品吗？

String.Source: Still, I'm best known for a terrible piece of tripe I wrote about seven years ago called "The Duke of Beards."
String.Dest: 我这么有名，还是因为我七年多前写完的垃圾作品，叫做《大胡子公爵》。

String.Source: Speaking of books and authors, what do you think of this?
String.Dest: 说到书籍和作者，你对这个有什么看法？

String.Source: Let's see...now if I'm being perfectly honest, I would say this is apprentice level work...but, that being said, you've got talent.
String.Dest: 让我们想一下……现在如果我完全坦白，我会说这是学徒工的水平……但是，这样说的话，你很有天赋。

String.Source: Speaking of books and authors, what do you think of this?
String.Dest: 说到书籍和作者，你对这个有什么看法？

String.Source: Of course, I'm assuming this manuscript is yours?
String.Dest: Of course, I'm assuming this manuscript is yours?

String.Source: You implied before it could be commercially successful but an artistic failure.
String.Dest: 你说过这部作品虽然无法在艺术领域上取得突破，但能在商业领域获得成功。

String.Source: Aye, I did. That was a mistake on my part. I never thought our writer could make such improvements in a short amount time.
String.Dest: Aye, I did. That was a mistake on my part. I never thought our writer could make such improvements in a short amount time.

String.Source: You implied before it could be commercially successful but an artistic failure.
String.Dest: 你说过这部作品虽然无法在艺术领域上取得突破，但能在商业领域获得成功。

String.Source: Unless, of course, this manuscript was written a long time ago. Either way, the growth is there, as is the talent.
String.Dest: Unless, of course, this manuscript was written a long time ago. Either way, the growth is there, as is the talent.

String.Source: How do you know I won't keep the gold for myself?
String.Dest: 你怎么知道我不会私吞这笔金币。

String.Source: Well, I don't. That's the price of being lazy. Still, you've come this far to help the poor lad, so I doubt you plan on shorting him now.
String.Dest: Well, I don't. That's the price of being lazy. Still, you've come this far to help the poor lad, so I doubt you plan on shorting him now.

String.Source: I read it, and it's still better served as kindling.
String.Dest: 我读完它，还是感觉它最好去当引火柴吧。

String.Source: Oh, don't be so harsh on the lad! I'm guessing he's still young, and he's got time. The important thing is, he finally has a voice he can trust.
String.Dest: Oh, don't be so harsh on the lad! I'm guessing he's still young, and he's got time. The important thing is, he finally has a voice he can trust.

String.Source: I read it, and it's still better served as kindling.
String.Dest: 我读完它，还是感觉它最好去当引火柴吧。

String.Source: Whether he develops that voice into something that begs to be heard, well, we'll see. But I wouldn't bet against him.
String.Dest: 他是否能让这种声音发展到别人都争相想要听到的地步呢？好吧，让我们瞧瞧。但我不敢说他能做到。

String.Source: Do you really think it's any good?
String.Dest: 你觉得这真的有益处？

String.Source: Well, good is a relative term. For a debut novel from an unknown writer...it's not bad.
String.Dest: Well, good is a relative term. For a debut novel from an unknown writer...it's not bad.

String.Source: Do you really think it's any good?
String.Dest: 你觉得这真的有益处？

String.Source: But the lad has potential, and I think it's worth investing our time.
String.Dest: 但是这小伙子有潜力，我认为投入我们的时间是值得的。

String.Source: I've brought you Jaspar's rewritten manuscript.
String.Dest: 我给你带来了福林重写的手稿。

String.Source: And here I thought the story of the Orc with the stone hands would never get told! Glad to see you've kept it safe. Now let me take a look.
String.Dest: And here I thought the story of the Orc with the stone hands would never get told! Glad to see you've kept it safe. Now let me take a look.

String.Source: I've brought you Jaspar's rewritten manuscript.
String.Dest: 我给你带来了福林重写的手稿。

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! Now this, my friend, is a story! Give me a season or two, and the name Jaspar Gaerston will be known from here to Stros M'Kai!
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! Now this, my friend, is a story! Give me a season or two, and the name Jaspar Gaerston will be known from here to Stros M'Kai!

String.Source: I've brought you Jaspar's rewritten manuscript.
String.Dest: 我给你带来了福林重写的手稿。

String.Source: Here. Take this gold. Half is for you, and the other half is an advance for our newest writer.
String.Dest: Here. Take this gold. Half is for you, and the other half is an advance for our newest writer.

String.Source: I've brought you Jaspar's rewritten manuscript.
String.Dest: 我给你带来了福林重写的手稿。

String.Source: And here I thought the story of the Orc with the stone hands would never get told! Glad to see you've kept it safe. Now let me take a look.
String.Dest: 我想这个有着石之手的兽人的故事从未被人所知。很高兴看到你把它安安全全的带到了。现在让我看看。

String.Source: I've brought you Jaspar's rewritten manuscript.
String.Dest: 我给你带来了福林重写的手稿。

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! Now this, my friend, is a story! Ah, but I see our author has chosen to remain anonymous.
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! Now this, my friend, is a story! Ah, but I see our author has chosen to remain anonymous.

String.Source: I've brought you Jaspar's rewritten manuscript.
String.Dest: 我给你带来了福林重写的手稿。

String.Source: Still lacking conviction, I suppose. Yet his words do not.
String.Dest: Still lacking conviction, I suppose. Yet his words do not.

String.Source: I've brought you Jaspar's rewritten manuscript.
String.Dest: 我给你带来了福林重写的手稿。

String.Source: Here. Half is for you, half is for our dour friend. Maybe some bread and some mead will lift his spirits. It always works for me.
String.Dest: Here. Half is for you, half is for our dour friend. Maybe some bread and some mead will lift his spirits. It always works for me.

String.Source: What's the new novel about?
String.Dest: 这本新小说是讲什么的？

String.Source: Would you believe me if I said I hadn't decided? Inspiration is funny that way.
String.Dest: Would you believe me if I said I hadn't decided? Inspiration is funny that way.

String.Source: What's the new novel about?
String.Dest: 这本新小说是讲什么的？

String.Source: There's so many stories to tell just in Solitude alone. You hear about pirate tales, shadowy dealings, and news of war.
String.Dest: There's so many stories to tell just in Solitude alone. You hear about pirate tales, shadowy dealings, and news of war.

String.Source: What's the new novel about?
String.Dest: 这本新小说是讲什么的？

String.Source: I even heard a tale about a horker so large it wrecked a ship somewhere on the North shore.
String.Dest: I even heard a tale about a horker so large it wrecked a ship somewhere on the North shore.

String.Source: What's the new novel about?
String.Dest: 这本新小说是讲什么的？

String.Source: But just because you have a story, doesn't mean I'm the right voice to tell it. When it comes, I'll know.
String.Dest: But just because you have a story, doesn't mean I'm the right voice to tell it. When it comes, I'll know.

String.Source: She fancies gossip, but she might like you too.
String.Dest: 她喜欢花边新闻，不过或许她也喜欢你。

String.Source: An Elf after my own heart! Ha-ha-ha! Writers and gossips are one in the same. Everything we hear, everyone we meet, finds their way into a story.
String.Dest: An Elf after my own heart! Ha-ha-ha! Writers and gossips are one in the same. Everything we hear, everyone we meet, finds their way into a story.

String.Source: She fancies gossip, but she might like you too.
String.Dest: 她喜欢花边新闻，不过或许她也喜欢你。

String.Source: And in the end, most of it is lies.
String.Dest: 而且最后，大多数都是谎言。

String.Source: She probably just wanted to learn about you so she could spread more lies.
String.Dest: 恐怕她只是想通过对你更多的了解来散布更多的谎言。

String.Source: Is that so? Ha-ha-ha! Well, whatever she says, it can't be much worse than the truth.
String.Dest: Is that so? Ha-ha-ha! Well, whatever she says, it can't be much worse than the truth.

String.Source: Nythriel is a trustworthy Elf. Great at keeping secrets.
String.Dest: 奈瑞儿是个值得信赖的精灵，她很善于保守秘密。

String.Source: That would be great lad, if I had secrets to keep. Most of mine find their way onto the page.
String.Dest: That would be great lad, if I had secrets to keep. Most of mine find their way onto the page.

String.Source: Nythriel is a trustworthy Elf. Great at keeping secrets.
String.Dest: 奈瑞儿是个值得信赖的精灵，她很善于保守秘密。

String.Source: That would be great lass, if I had secrets to keep. Most of mine find their way onto the page.
String.Dest: That would be great lass, if I had secrets to keep. Most of mine find their way onto the page.

String.Source: Are you new in town?
String.Dest: 你是刚到镇上来吧？

String.Source: Just got off the ship, as it were, fresh as a flounder.
String.Dest: 才从船上运下来呢，看看，就像新鲜的海鱼。

String.Source: Are you new in town?
String.Dest: 你是刚到镇上来吧？

String.Source: I came here to pen my next great novel, and while I'm here, keep an eye out for talent.
String.Dest: 我来这里是打算动笔写下一本小说，而且虽然我在这里，也是时常关注外面的事情来找寻灵感。

String.Source: Are you new in town?
String.Dest: 你是刚到镇上来吧？

String.Source: Of course, talent comes in many forms, and they never specified what kind!
String.Dest: 当然，天赋有很多种类，而他们从没有弄清楚是哪一种天赋！

String.Source: Are you new in town?
String.Dest: 你是刚到镇上来吧？

String.Source: Why just the other day I had a delightful conversation with a High Elf named Nythriel. I think she fancies writers.
String.Dest: 哎呀我前天刚跟一个名叫奈瑞尔的高精灵很开心地聊过。她可是很喜欢作家的呢。

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: Well lad, don't hold back, tell me how you really feel! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 好孩子，别隐瞒，告诉我你到底是怎么想的！ (笑声)

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: You're preaching to the acolytes, my boy. The book is about as awful as a piece of non-fiction gets.
String.Dest: 你在对侍祭们说教，我的孩子。这本书快和纪实小说一样无聊了。

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: While other races dabble in magic, painting, and the culinary arts, it makes us Nords look like chest-thumping apes obsessed with facial hair.
String.Dest: 相比于别的种族擅长魔法、绘画和厨艺，我们诺德人就好像长了胡子的捶胸大猩猩。

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: No wonder the Thalmor think so low of us!
String.Dest: 难怪梭默会看不起我们！

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: Well lass, don't hold back, tell me how you really feel! Ha-ha-ha!
String.Dest: Well lass, don't hold back, tell me how you really feel! Ha-ha-ha!

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: You're preaching to the acolytes, girl. The book is about as awful as a piece of non-fiction gets.
String.Dest: 你这是在向僧侣布道，姑娘。这本书几乎和《知音》一样糟糕。

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: While other races dabble in magic, painting, and the culinary arts, it makes us Nords look like chest-thumping apes obsessed with facial hair.
String.Dest: 相比于别的种族擅长魔法、绘画和厨艺，我们诺德人就好像长了胡子的捶胸大猩猩。

String.Source: Your book is awful and you should feel awful for writing it.
String.Dest: 你的书棒极了，你该为写它感到自豪。

String.Source: No wonder the Thalmor think so low of us!
String.Dest: 难怪梭默会看不起我们！

String.Source: I'll do that first thing in the morning after I make 1000 copies.
String.Dest: 我抄完1000份后，明早第一件事就是它。

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! You might as well just stick a knife in my career then as well. Here I was thinking I might be remembered for something else.
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! You might as well just stick a knife in my career then as well. Here I was thinking I might be remembered for something else.

String.Source: I'll do that first thing in the morning after I make 1000 copies.
String.Dest: 我抄完1000份后，明早第一件事就是它。

String.Source: I suppose it's just as well. So long as they don't forget me, I'll always have someone to pour ale on my headstone.
String.Dest: 我想这也不错。只要他们别忘了我。我总得需要某个人将啤酒浇在我的墓碑上。

String.Source: What made you write the book? Is there really a "Duke of Beards?"
String.Dest: 是什么让你写这本书？是否真的有《公爵的胡子》？

String.Source: By the Gods, I hope not. The last thing I need is more attention being brought to my book.
String.Dest: By the Gods, I hope not. The last thing I need is more attention being brought to my book.

String.Source: What made you write the book? Is there really a "Duke of Beards?"
String.Dest: 是什么让你写这本书？是否真的有《公爵的胡子》？

String.Source: As for what made me write it, it was desperation. I was capitalizing on the buzz surrounding the Gourmet's book, "Uncommon Taste."
String.Dest: As for what made me write it, it was desperation. I was capitalizing on the buzz surrounding the Gourmet's book, "Uncommon Taste."

String.Source: What made you write the book? Is there really a "Duke of Beards?"
String.Dest: 是什么让你写这本书？是否真的有《公爵的胡子》？

String.Source: People love a good mystery, especially if it involves people they run into every day.
String.Dest: 人们都喜欢神秘的事情，尤其是涉及到他们每天都能见面的人的时候。.

String.Source: What made you write the book? Is there really a "Duke of Beards?"
String.Dest: 是什么让你写这本书？是否真的有《公爵的胡子》？

String.Source: It's not like some magical ocean beast only a handful of sailors claim to have seen. The Duke of Beards could've been anyone. That was the appeal.
String.Dest: It's not like some magical ocean beast only a handful of sailors claim to have seen. The Duke of Beards could've been anyone. That was the appeal.

String.Source: I don't see what's so bad about it.
String.Dest: 我没看出它有什么不好的。

String.Source: Well, I suppose "bad" was a poor choice of words. Thank Dibella I didn't print them this time!
String.Dest: Well, I suppose "bad" was a poor choice of words. Thank Dibella I didn't print them this time!

String.Source: I don't see what's so bad about it.
String.Dest: 我没看出它有什么不好的。

String.Source: No, the problem with that book is, I made it sound like we Nords are a bunch of barbarians obsessed with facial hair.
String.Dest: 不，那本书的问题出在，我把我们诺德人描述成满脸长满毛发的粗鲁野蛮人。

String.Source: I don't see what's so bad about it.
String.Dest: 我没看出它有什么不好的。

String.Source: Besides, I'm not even sure the "Duke of Beards" exists, but I didn't let that stop me from making him a legend.
String.Dest: 另外，我并不确定“公爵胡须” 的存在， 但这并不会阻止我让他成为一个传奇。

String.Source: I actually have a copy of your book.
String.Dest: 我还真的有一本你的书。

String.Source: Good, then you can do me a favor and throw it into pilgrim's trench, although with my luck, the bloody thing probably knows how to swim!
String.Dest: 好极了，那就帮我个小忙，把这书丢进朝圣者的战壕，尽管这该死的玩意儿如果够走运的话说不定已经学会了游泳！

String.Source: Actually, I've come here to see you about something.
String.Dest: 实际上，我的确是有事而来。

String.Source: It's not to have me sign your book, is it? I mean, don't get me wrong, I'd be glad to, so long as it's one of my later works.
String.Dest: 我并不需要在你的书上签字，对么？不要误解，既然这是我以后的作品，我很高兴签这个字。

String.Source: Actually, I've come here to see you about something.
String.Dest: 实际上，我的确是有事而来。

String.Source: But there's plenty of time for that later. Besides, you ought to at least buy me a drink before you start making demands!
String.Dest: 但我们时间还充裕着呢。此外，你真应该在跟我提要求之前至少再给我买杯酒！

String.Source: If you appreciate the female form, then your view is as good as any.
String.Dest: 如果你欣赏女性做派，那你的观点就是顶呱呱的。

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! Aye lass, I meant no offense. I was trying to be polite, and I think I might've made things worse!
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! Aye lass, I meant no offense. I was trying to be polite, and I think I might've made things worse!

String.Source: If you appreciate the female form, then your view is as good as any.
String.Dest: 如果你欣赏女性做派，那你的观点就是顶呱呱的。

String.Source: This mouth of mine always gets me into trouble. That's why I'm a writer, and not a bard.
String.Dest: This mouth of mine always gets me into trouble. That's why I'm a writer, and not a bard.

String.Source: Too bad. You will stare at this male form and admire it or leave.
String.Dest: 真糟糕。你应该看看这个男款，然后要么喜欢，要么离开。

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! Sorry lad, I think I'd rather just stare at my cup. Although I'm sure there's a lass or two in this inn who wouldn't mind having this seat.
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! Sorry lad, I think I'd rather just stare at my cup. Although I'm sure there's a lass or two in this inn who wouldn't mind having this seat.

String.Source: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.
String.Dest: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha! I'm sorry lad, but I haven't the slightest idea what you're talking about!
String.Dest: Ha-ha-ha! I'm sorry lad, but I haven't the slightest idea what you're talking about!

String.Source: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.
String.Dest: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.

String.Source: I'm actually sterile, believe it or not. One of the great gifts Dibella granted me, and there's not a day I don't thank her for it.
String.Dest: I'm actually sterile, believe it or not. One of the great gifts Dibella granted me, and there's not a day I don't thank her for it.

String.Source: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.
String.Dest: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.

String.Source: (Laughs) I'm sorry lass, but I haven't the slightest idea what you're talking about!
String.Dest: (笑声) 对不住了姑娘，我一时半会真的想不明白你在说什么！

String.Source: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.
String.Dest: Stop the lies. I know you're here to spy on your illegitimate daughter.

String.Source: I'm actually sterile, believe it or not. One of the great gifts Dibella granted me, and there's not a day I don't thank her for it.
String.Dest: I'm actually sterile, believe it or not. One of the great gifts Dibella granted me, and there's not a day I don't thank her for it.

String.Source: The name's Flin, by the way. Author, publisher, and admirer of the female form.
String.Dest: The name's Flin, by the way. Author, publisher, and admirer of the female form.

String.Source: Safe travels.
String.Dest: 旅途安全。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: Just having a drink with my new protege.
String.Dest: 仅仅是和我的新徒弟喝一杯.

String.Source: Jaspar's got a long career ahead of him.
String.Dest: Jaspar's got a long career ahead of him.

String.Source: You're welcome to join us, just grab a chair.
String.Dest: 欢迎加入我们，请随便找张椅子坐。

String.Source: Need something?
String.Dest: 有事吗？

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 贵安。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 很高兴见面。

String.Source: Because it is lad. It's only hard if you make it so.
String.Dest: Because it is lad. It's only hard if you make it so.

String.Source: Well, it doesn't have to be wenches. What's the male equivalent of that? A porter? Find yourself one of those. Have a fling.
String.Dest: 嗯，不一定要是个女侍。干这种活的男人叫什么来着？酒保？你自己想想吧。尝试一下。

String.Source: Well, that's because you're devoted to your craft. Being a writer, especially a young writer, is a solitary existence. There's no time for love.
String.Dest: Well, that's because you're devoted to your craft. Being a writer, especially a young writer, is a solitary existence. There's no time for love.

String.Source: Plenty of time for wenches, though. Ha-ha-ha! That will have to do.
String.Dest: Plenty of time for wenches, though. Ha-ha-ha! That will have to do.

String.Source: You know what you need lad, is a muse, and not some bloody Orc.
String.Dest: 你知道你要的是什么吗年轻人，是缪斯女神（灵感），而不是什么见鬼的兽人。

String.Source: That, I find hard to believe.
String.Dest: 我发现我很难相信那个。

String.Source: Lad, you really are as dolorous as your stories.
String.Dest: 小伙子，你的确如你的故事一样忧伤。

String.Source: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
String.Dest: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
